wellness_resources.title: Beginner Yoga Routine
wellness_resources.description: A gentle yoga routine to improve flexibility and reduce stress.

wellness_resources.title: Mindfulness Meditation
wellness_resources.description: Techniques to enhance mental clarity and reduce anxiety.

wellness_resources.title: Vegan Nutrition
wellness_resources.description: A balanced vegan meal can include a variety of plant-based foods to ensure you're getting a wide range of essential nutrients.

wellness_resources.title: Cardio Workout
wellness_resources.description: A best cardio can include High Intensity Interval training (HIIT) where you can burn calories efficiently and improve cardio fitness.

wellness_resources.title: Lifting Weights
wellness_resources.description: Strength training by lifting weights can help boost your metabolism, for example building muscles while also increasing your metabolic rate.

wellness_resources.title: Good Sleep
wellness_resources.description: Getting at least eight hours of sleep can help improve your mood. Try to avoid electronics before bed.

wellness_resources.title: Take breaks
wellness_resources.description: Spending too much time online can negatively affect your mental health. Try taking breaks and do other activities like enjoying nature, reading, etc.

wellness_resources.title: Drink water
wellness_resources.description: Drink plenty of water, or other fluids to stay hydrated. Our body needs water to function effectively. It is recommended to drink about 8 cups of water each day.

wellness_resources.title: Eat less processed foods
wellness_resources.description: Limit processed and packaged snacks, and eat more fresh, unprocessed foods.

wellness_resources.title: Eat mindfully
wellness_resources.description: Be aware of your bodyâ€™s hunger and satiety signals, and savor your food.
